name: Heavy Artillery
Description: This card can attack and block while retreated

name: Greater Saber
Description: Once per your turn, you can reduce the DP of a Creature by 2

name: Original Ruler
Description:
When a Creature you control is destroyed, place 1 counter on this card. You can remove counters to: 
1 counter: Negate an attack
2 counters: Inflict 1 DP to a Realm
3 counters: Negate a card Effect
4 counters: Draw 2 cards

name: King of Ornaments
Description:
This card gains Abilities based on the number of cards equipped to it:
1: Increase ist DP by 1
2: Heal its HP by 1 at the end of your turns
3: It can attack twice per Battle Phase 
4: It is impervious to Abilities

name: Angeldust Fox
Description: Generate 1 Word during your Word Phases. Once per turn, you can use Words to increase the DP or HP of a card you control by the number of Words used until the end of the turn

name: Blackhole magician
Description: Creatures that target this card for an attack are flipped face-down after damage calculation

name: Vapor Shaman
Description: Once per turn, you can redo a card Effect that involved chance

name: Basis Warrior
Description: Increase the DP of all creatures you control by 3.

name: Immortal Flame
Description: Once per your turn, you can excavate the top card of your deck. If it is an Undead-type card, speak it without Words.

name: World Eater
Description: You can skip your Battle Phase to inflict 1 DP to an opponent´s Realm. This Ability cannot be used during the first turn.

name: Witch of Mind
Description: Once per your turn, you can use 4 Words to take control of 1 of your opponent´s Creatures until the end of the turn.

name: Cosmic Puppeteer
Description: Once per your turn, during your Main Phase, you can target 1 Creature you control: it gains 5 DP and HP. You can only target 1 Creature you control at a time.

name: Guard of the Rabbit Hole
Description: You can use 4 Words to bounce a Creature

name: Queen of Cosmic Orbits
Description: You can use 5 Words to exchange a Creature you control for a Creature your opponent controls

name: Cybernetic Droid

name: Split Arrow Archer
Description: This card can attack twice during your Battle Phase

name: Fractal Feathers
Description: Generate 2 Words every time this card attacks

name: Bladesaw Runner
Description: Creatures attacked by this card are destroyed at the end of the turn

name: Betrayer Moon
Description: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. Cards attacking this card gain Piercing damage during their attack

name: Null
Description: At the end of the turn that this card is spoken, it is impervious to Effects, cannot be attacked, and cannot defend a Hero. If there are 3 copies of this card on your field, you lose the game

name: Mochi Roll
Description: Place 2 Counters on this card during each Word Phase (Max 10). When this card is destroyed, generate 1 Word for every Counter on it

name: Soul Envoy
Description: While you have more Words than your opponent, this card gains 2 DP, 5 HP, and, once per turn, can negate an attack

name: Shrieker
Description: When this card is spoken, flip all other Creatures on the field facedown. This card gains 1 DP for every facedown Creature on the field

name: FatherAI
Description: While you have more Words than your opponent, you can, once per turn, negate the speaking of a Spell or Curse

name: Frontier Knight
Description: If your Hero were to be destroyed while this card is on your field, destroy this card instead

name: Spellsworm Dragon

name: Curseworm Dragon
Description: When this card is spoken, excavate the top 5 cards of your deck. If any were Curses, you can add those Curses to your hand

name: Fusion Dragon
Description: This card can only be spoken by discarding 2 Spells or Curses from your hand. This card is impervious to Enchantments. Once per your turn, you can add 1 Spell or Curse from the Silence to your hand

name: Scarecrow
Description: Your opponent can only target “scarecrow” cards for an attack

name: Mage of the Dying Sun
Description: When this card is spoken, you can inflict 1 DP to a Realm your opponent controls

name: Hypersonic Eagle

Description: A traveler simply stopping between worlds

name: Slipway Rogue

name: Psycho Virus

name: v1
Description: If this card is destroyed by an Effect, draw a card

name: v2
Description: If this card is destroyed by an Effect, reduce your opponent’s Words by 2

name: v3
Description: If this card is destroyed by an Effect, you can speak a Creature from the silence without Words

name: vFinal

name: Blessed Fox
